attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Swansea Observatory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want our Observatory to remain open for our children to continue to be educated in the technological sphere of space, and our adults to be proud of housing the largest telescope in Wales in a beautiful seafront tower and benefit from this in many aspects, talks, telescope viewings etc.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Prevent the closure of Swansea Observatory."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22415


Prime Minister's Office
